title: FS: T201 Huggins / Bresnahan PSA 1 looks nicer
author: scooter729

posts.post_title: FS: T201 Huggins / Bresnahan PSA 1 looks nicer
posts.post_content:
Hi there,

For sale is a PSA 1 T201 Huggins / Bresnahan.  Card looks better than the grade with decent corners and a clean back, but there is a small tear at the bottom (just to the left of Huggins' left foot, which is visible in the scan).

$38 gets the card delivered to your door.  Paypal or check is fine.  Post here or email to [url]scooter0729@yahoo.com[/url].

Thanks,
Scott
